name: Someday
content: 过去经常 每件事都很肤浅
God give me truthIn me and tell me
在于我 告诉我有人在看 越过我
And that is all I am prayingIs that
And what he's done to me
See it all in my baby
我会在我孩子身上看见
Don't you run too fast my dear
Stop and listen to your tears
在于你 你看见有人在看 越过你
And that is all I am praying Is that
And what he does to you
有一天你会呼吸到生命的气息
See it all in your baby
所有的你会在你的孩子身上看见
See it all in your baby
所有的你会在你的孩子身上看见
No moment will be more true
不要停留 没有比这更真实
Than the moment I look at you
在于你 你会看见有人在看
You see somebody is watching Over You
And that is all I am praying  Is that
And what he does to you
See it all in your baby
所有的你会在你的孩子身上看见
See it all in your baby
所有的你会在你的孩子身上看见
